descrip: A single GraphQL query can potentially generate a huge workload for a server, like thousands of database operations which can be used to cause DDoS attacks. In order to limit and keep track of what each GraphQL operation can do, `TypeGraphQL` provides the option of integrating with Query Complexity tools like [graphql-query-complexity](https://github.com/ivome/graphql-query-complexity).
